entry.def: If you describe someone as easy-going, you mean that they are not easily annoyed, worried, or upset, and you think this is a good quality.

example.ex: Athenians have a very easy-going attitude to life.
example.tran: 雅典人对待生活非常怡然自得。

sentences.sentence: "an easygoing life as a parttime consultant"
"an easygoing man rarely stirred to anger"
